name: The Graveyard Shift
description:
*** Gamepad required ***

-1 - 4 player co-op survival game

-Wave based gameplay

-Twinstick shooter

-Made for Deakin Game Development Group's summer of 2017 48 hour Game Jam.

-Made using Game Maker Studio 1.4

Controls

  • Left Stick: move
  • Right Stick: aim
  • Right Trigger: Shoot
  • Start button: restart        *only on game over screen*
